mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.value AS "value", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_sys_config a
AND a.code LIKE '%'||#{code}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%')
ORDER BY ${entityPage.orderBy} ${entityPage.order}
ORDER BY a.code ASC

SELECT
FROM t_sys_config a
AND (a.code LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR a.value LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') )
ORDER BY ${entityPage.orderBy} ${entityPage.order}
ORDER BY a.code ASC

SELECT
FROM t_sys_config a
ORDER BY ${entityPage.orderBy} ${entityPage.order}
ORDER BY a.code ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_config( id, code, value, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{value}, #{remark} )
